proposal: Diving into the divine realm of Olympus404 with its 3,333 mystical NFTs, we see the magic you're crafting with ERC404. Congrats on gathering 88 holders in the ETH network! Imagine enhancing this unique gamified experience with our suite of B2B tools - from creating your own DEX to launching lotteries that your community, not just the gods, can deploy. Let's blend our powers for an even mightier Olympus.
